name: Varsha Jaiswal
bio: Varsha is a girl with a bag full of hardwork and determination to fulfill her responsibilities. Working as a Software Engineer, she has a keen interest in working on new technologies. Being a facilitator of #IamRemarkable Workshop, she always gives her best to motivate her surrounding. Despite busy schedules, she never misses any chance to travel and eat.

name: Riya Guha Thakurta
bio: Riya is an Associate Software Engineer working with Johnson Controls. She believes in contributing towards community and sharing knowledge with others to solve their problems, which leads her to serve for her regional community as a WomenTechmakers Ambassador and Co-organizer of Google Developers Group Kolkata.Being an Intel Software Innovator she looks forward to share her expertise which thrives to innovation and would be helpful for tech enthusiasts to build solution in IoT.She love programming and applying her skills to solve real life problems and make life smarter.

name: Vrijraj Singh
bio: Vrijraj is a front-end developer by profession and an outstanding person in daily life. Thinking out of the box is what he believes in doing. He states that learning is a process that never stops, even if you are old enough, there will be things that you can still learn. He is always eager to learn new technologies and develop new things based on it.

name: Punita Ojha

community.name: GDG Udaipur & WTM Udaipur
community.designation: Organizer GDG Udaipur, WTM Ambassador & #IamRemarkable Facilitator

bio: Punita Ojha is a full-stack web developer at Sanskrut Corporation. She is skilled in technologies like Angular JS, Python, Google Cloud, etc. She is an organizer of GDG Udaipur and WTM Udaipur. She is also a machine learning enthusiast, she has pursued her Machine Learning Engineer Nanodegree From Udacity and loves to spend her free time playing around with models. She loves inspiring newbies into Technology by bringing them together via events, peer programming sessions, tech talks, code labs, and different activities.

name: Mayur Sojitra
bio: Mayur Sojitra is Full Stack Developer and Founder of Murait Technologies and have a expertise in multiple technologies. Having 6+ years of experience. Community Leader of Google Developers Group Surat, VueJS Surat and Laravel Surat.

name: Santosh Yadav
bio: Santosh is a GDE for Angular and Web Technologies and an active contributor to Angular and NgRx. He writes for AngularInDepth, mentors at Dotnettricks and is an organizer of the Pune Tech Meetup. He is the creator of the `ng deploy` package for Netlify and part of the NestJSAddons core team.

name: Parth Jansari
bio: I'm a guy who's trying to grow up & do mature stuff but ends up making cool stuff or designing/coding. flutter and angular enthusiast.

name: Arpan Garg
bio: An Organizer with GDG New Delhi, Arpan is very passionate about communities. From taking sessions on Web Development which is also his are of Tech Expertise, to doing some creative fun activities during the events, you'll find him filled with energy. Professionally he is a Product guy and is right now working on his own product which will help communities grow!

name: Tushar Pal
bio: Tushar Pal is CTO and Cofounder of Protonshub Technologies and having a expertise in multiple technologies.He is also product consultant at Diaspark Infotech to helping out a best product. Community Leader of Google Cloud Developer Community,Indore and Google Developers Group,Indore. There is something special when career and passion comes together. No excuses to yourself because reality is wrong and dreams are real  He is very big ambition to build the biggest ecosystem in a town which helps us to grow our careers and build a stronger network.

name: Debiprasad Sahoo
bio: Debiprasad is a freelance fullstack developer based out of Bhubaneswar, India. He contributes to the developers' community by leading GDG Bhubaneswar as an Organizer with a goal to bring all developers of the city together. He is also a vocal advocate for gender equality at work.
